pages.text: The $(mob)Donkey$() is an animal that is very similar to $(l:minecraft_horse)$(mob)Horses$(). Compared to them, it is smaller and cannot wear armor once tamed. It can however be given a $(item)Chest$(), allowing it to transport 15 stacks of items.$(p)Breeding one with a $(l:minecraft_horse)$(mob)Horse$() produces a sterile $(l:minecraft_mule)$(mob)Mule$() as offspring.
